article_title: A Fireside Chat With Mario Draghi
article_text:
European Central Bank President Mario Draghi delivered a speech Friday, Dec. 4 to the Economic Club of New York. He sat down afterward for a question-and-answer session with former Bank of England Governor Mervyn King, New York Fed President William Dudley and Robert Hormats, Vice Chairman, Kissinger Associates. Here is a transcript of their conversation.

MR. DRAGHI: Let me tell you how the whole story developed, really. It started in the last Governing Council about a month and a half ago. We made an assessment. We...

article_metadata.article.origheadline: A Fireside Chat With Mario Draghi

article_summary:
European Central Bank President Mario Draghi delivered a speech Friday, Dec. 4 to the Economic Club of New York.
MR. DRAGHI: Let me tell you how the whole story developed, really.
He sat down afterward for a question-and-answer session with former Bank of England Governor Mervyn King, New York Fed President William Dudley and Robert Hormats, Vice Chairman, Kissinger Associates.
It started in the last Governing Council about a month and a half ago.
Here is a transcript of their conversation.
